TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_FOOD] on Rainforest

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Kukulkan[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra food to all rainforest tiles worked by its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: League of Nations

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]League of Nations[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] converted when building [ICON_COMMERCE]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Congresses occur every four turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your cities cannot be demanded in Congress[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Other civilizations are more willing to approve your demands in Congress

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace of Nations[COLOR_REVERT] defends your cities from being demanded in Congress and other civilizations are more willing to approve your demands in Congress. It makes Congresses occur every four turns. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chateau Frontenac[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist.

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chateau Frontenac[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT] allows its builder to switch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religions[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Civics[COLOR_REVERT] instantly once per turn, with no anarchy. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Christ Rédempteur[COLOR_REVERT] permet à son constructeur de changer de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religion[COLOR_REVERT] ou de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] instantanément, une fois par tour et sans période d'anarchie. Il augmente aussi les chances qu'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]prophète illustre[COLOR_REVERT] apparaisse.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT]-Statue ermöglicht ihrem Erbauer, einmal pro Runde augenblicklich die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religion[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Staatsform[COLOR_REVERT] zu wechseln, ohne dadurch Anarchie zu verursachen. Sie erhöht auch die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großer Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] auftaucht.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentore[COLOR_REVERT] permette a chi lo costruisce di cambiare [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religione[COLOR_REVERT] o [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forma di governo[COLOR_REVERT] istantaneamente una volta per turno, senza generare anarchia. Aumenta inoltre le probabilità che appaia un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Sacerdote[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT] permite a su constructor cambiar instantáneamente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religión[COLOR_REVERT] o de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]principios[COLOR_REVERT] una vez por turno, sin sufrir los efectos de la anarquía. También aumenta las posibilidades de que aparezca un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sumo sacerdote[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Disables cascading defensive pacts
Biltmore Estate

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biltmore Estate[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Railway Station[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and increases the building speed for railroads.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biltmore Estate[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Railway Station[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and increases the building speed for railroads.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biltmore Estate[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Railway Station[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and increases the building speed for railroads.

TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biltmore Estate[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Railway Station[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and increases the building speed for railroads.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+50% building speed for Railroads
Central Park

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Park[COLOR_REVERT] Increases a city's health and provides happiness for excessive health in its city.

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Park[COLOR_REVERT] Increases a city's health and provides happiness for excessive health in its city.

Ellis Island

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ellis Island[COLOR_REVERT] increases immigration rate in all cities.

TEXT.French: Faneuil Hall

TEXT.French: Fort McHenry

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fort McHenry[COLOR_REVERT] reduces damage from bombardments from all units and increases war weariness in the cities of those who go to war against its builder.

TEXT.French: French Quarter

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]French Quarter[COLOR_REVERT] restores the Great People Points when settling Great People.

Gate of the Sun

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Serpent Mound[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's health and happiness. It also allows you to train an additional [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist in your cities with a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Commons[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empire State Building[COLOR_REVERT] provides a gold bonus equal to the population of the city in which it's built. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Golden Gate Bridge[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional commerce to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: Hoover Dam

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hoover Dam[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power and increases the tile yields of desert and semidesert.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Minimum of 1[ICON_FOOD], 1[ICON_PRODUCTION], and 1[ICON_COMMERCE] on Desert and Semidesert in all cities
